scripts.test:integration: cd firebase && firebase emulators:exec --import emulator 'cd .. && vitest run --dir tests/integration'
scripts.test:integration:auth: cd firebase && firebase emulators:exec --import emulator 'cd .. && vitest run auth --dir tests/integration'
scripts.test:integration:blockstore: cd firebase && firebase emulators:exec --import emulator 'cd .. && vitest run block --dir tests/integration'
scripts.test:integration:bucket: cd firebase && firebase emulators:exec --import emulator 'cd .. && vitest run bucket --dir tests/integration'
